cleaned_text: Energy Aromatherapy Roller [](/products/energy) Energy Aromatherapy Roller Description As part of our Energy product line of Aromatherapy Roller, our formulated blend of essential oils ensures that you can naturally and effectively keep going all day long. Our Energy blend of essential oils is diluted in fractionated coconut oil to make sure that you feel energized and motivated to check off all the things on your to-do list. Love the Energy Aromatherapy Roller? Try our other Energy products! Ingredients Grapefruit Essential Oil* How Use Apply product to your pulse points for optimal strength. We recommend your neck, wrists, temples, or bottoms of your feet. Safety Safety: Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not use internally. If irritation occurs, stop using product immediately. Safe for kids 2 years or older. - Shelf Life: 1 year from date of opening Uses [View full details](/products/energy) Earn Free Shipping Receive Free Shipping when purchasing $50 or more worth of product!
